item.title: Version 0.1.21
item.description:
Critical Changes: 1. Full Local Clipboard: All core features (except Syncing) are now available without requiring sign-in. 2. Local End-to-End Encryption: Enhanced security for all users when using syncing. 3. Extensive Keyboard Shortcuts: Faster navigation with new keyboard shortcuts.
General Changes: 1. Bug fixes and localization improvements. 2. UI tweaks for a better user experience.
